quote: Our parents' generation carried the past memorialized in paint, porcelain, and wood; we cast it off. Even our national history is remembered in terms of the worst we did, not the best.
quote_letters: OUR PARENTS GENERATION CARRIED THE PAST MEMORIALIZED IN PAINT PORCELAIN AND WOOD WE CAST IT OFF EVEN OUR NATIONAL HISTORY IS REMEMBERED IN TERMS OF THE WORST WE DID NOT THE BEST
